name: Project Speed
description:
Project Speed is a 3D Racing Game with multiple maps and vehicles to choose from made with the Unreal Engine. Race against AI or other players.




Project Speed is currently a free game. (Excluding possible future paid DLCs which will be purely cosmetic, if indeed there would ever be any DLCs + the possibility of the game becoming paid to help fund development if the need of funding arises.) - Game does not require a 3rd party account.



Currently the game is a somewhat of an early prototype as of release, but my plan is to add more content to the game, including some community content from the players, until full release from Early Access (Which I would say is probably a good year and a half, two years away... maybe even longer then that? My goal is to not have the game in Early Access for more than 4 years.)
